name: portfolio
description: This is the source code of the Portfolio of Shubham Kumar.  To keep my webpage simple and easy to maintain I have used HTML, CSS, Javascript seperatly without using any temlates.  NO other technologies like React, NextJs is used. This is done to keep things simple

scripts.build: rimraf dist && node build.js && ncp public dist/public && ncp public/thanks.html dist/public/thanks.html
